snippet: Two music institutes in New York use music and creative expression to try to improve the well-being of their clients, many of whom are autistic.
abstract: Institute for Music and Health in Dutchess County and Music Therapy Institute of the Music Conservatory of Westchester in White Plains use music and creative expression to improve well-being of their clients, many of whom are autistic (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: Two music institutes in New York use music and creative expression to try to improve the well-being of their clients, many of whom are autistic.

headline.print_headline: Coaxing Lyrical Voices From the Withdrawn
headline.main: Coaxing Lyrical Voices From the Withdrawn
